question: The Nalanda University has signed MoU with which country for academic linkages and colloborations?
explanation: The Nalanda University has signed MoU with South Korea\'s Academy of Korean Studies for academic linkages and collaborations in Patna, Bihar. As per the MoU, both the universities will increase their bilateral ties through joint research programmes, faculty and student exchange, mutual sharing of data, academic research/education, joint teaching & cooperation in other areas. The MoU will be in effect for 5 years.
